header.topics: Anecdote - being arrested when attempting to sail a boat from Jeddah to Cyprus. Teaching in Saudi Arabia and life there; alcohol in various countries; another sailing anecdote (Involving dental magazines)
header.activity: Friends talking over a glass of wine

body.u: I was assured the boat was in good nick and they had charts and had everything else because because said to him look if you need to get this boat out I've got a friend who's got his yacht masters cos I just passed my yacht masters and and we done quite a lot of sailing anyway and and he'll sail the boat for you mm so having checked that he's got everything I took a fortnight off work
mm
to sail this help sail this boat with and a boss bloke and it was fifty foot lovely boat but it hadn't been sailed nothing had been done to it
